channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ZOOKEEPER-1662] Fix to two small bugs in ReconfigTest.testPortChange()
item.description:
Fix to two small bugs in ReconfigTest.testPortChange():
1. the test expected a port change to happen immediately, which is not necessarily
going to happen. The fix waits a bit and also tries several times.
2. when a client port changes, the test created a new ZooKeeper handle, but didn't specify a Watcher object, which generated some NullPointerException events when the watcher was triggered.
item.summary: Fix to two small bugs in ReconfigTest.testPortChange()

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

We should really consider disabling testTransactionLogCorruption until its fixed.

SUCCESS: Integrated in ZooKeeper-trunk #2244 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/ZooKeeper-trunk/2244/)
ZOOKEEPER-1662. Fix to two small bugs in ReconfigTest.testPortChange() (Alexander Shraer via michim) (michim: http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Apache-SVN&view=rev&rev=1576174)
